name: Annie's Math for Kids
description:
MATH FOR KIDS WITH ANNIE - no ads version

Train your brain! Learn multiplying and dividing with Annie and her friends.

FEATURES

  • multiplication and division from 1 to 10
  • training and adventure mode
  • new characters and backgrounds in each level of adventure mode
  • math for school kids
  • statistics of success included
  • math game for kids
  • game form learning

The aim is to correctly choose result randomly chosen example. Applications calculates the correct and bad results, and show final table with the success of the resolved examples.
